## What is NoSQL?

"Not Only SQL" - non-relational databases.

## Why NoSQL?

- Flexible schemas
- Horizontal scaling
- High performance
- Big data friendly

| SQL | NoSQL |
|-----|-------|
| Tables | Various structures |
| Schema | Flexible |
| Scale up | Scale out |

> ğŸ’¡ Right tool for right job!

slides.title: When to Use
slides.content:
# When to Use NoSQL ğŸ¤”

## Use NoSQL When

- Flexible schema needed
- Massive scale required
- High write throughput
- Hierarchical data

## Stick with SQL When

- Complex queries
- ACID transactions critical
- Mature tooling needed

> ğŸ’¡ Often use both together!
